mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(GO_CITIZEN_ID) FROM go_hospitalization JOIN go_treat ON go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE=go_hospitalization.GO_TREAT_CODE join go_citizen ON go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NO = go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_NO WHERE GO_CITIZEN_ID='900101-1000001'

SELECT go_disease.GO_DISEASE_KOR, COUNT(*) AS goDiCount FROM go_hospitalization LEFT JOIN go_treat ON go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE=go_hospitalization.GO_TREAT_CODE LEFT join go_citizen ON go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NO = go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_NO LEFT JOIN go_diagnosis ON go_diagnosis.GO_TREAT_CODE = go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE LEFT JOIN go_disease ON go_disease.GO_DISEASE_CODE = go_diagnosis.GO_DISEASE_CODE where go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NO=#{citizen} GROUP BY go_disease.GO_DISEASE_KOR

SELECT go_surgery.GO_SURGERY_NAME, COUNT(*) AS goStatistics FROM go_surgery_result JOIN go_treat ON go_treat.GO_TREAT_CODE=go_surgery_result.GO_TREAT_CODE join go_citizen ON go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NO = go_treat.GO_CITIZEN_NO JOIN go_surgery ON go_surgery.GO_SURGERY_CODE = go_surgery_result.GO_SURGERY_CODE where go_citizen.GO_CITIZEN_NO=#{citizen} GROUP BY go_surgery.GO_SURGERY_NAME
SELECT go_diagnosis.GO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, go_disease.GO_DISEASE_KOR FROM go_diagnosis JOIN go_disease ON go_diagnosis.GO_DISEASE_CODE = go_disease.GO_DISEASE_CODE WHERE GO_TREAT_CODE = #{goTreatCode}
